text: our assignment was to design a
sustainable Footwear line for an
existing shoe company people are not
really willing to sacrifice comfort
durability style to be more sustainably
aware it was pretty frustrating because
every time you think of idea you think
it's so great and you turn to the
internet and you realize it's already
been done we actually were able to after
several iterations find one thing that
we thought was creative but that they
actually um were not doing a lot of
companies do offer sustain products but
we found that none of the existing shoes
actually had one unifying Factor where
if you saw that shoe on a street You' be
able to say oh that is a sustainable
shoe wear line I came from making which
is a very rigid environment and this is
actually opening my eyes to not only how
interesting uh the creative
opportunities are but also how
challenging they
are
